headingText: G.A.D. Elementary is a Kindergarten – Grade 9 independent school located in the Newton area of Surrey with an enrollment of over 600 students. We offer a very conducive environment for the children where they can develop skills to become productive and responsible citizens. G.A.D, an equal opportunity employer, is now accepting applications for the 2021- 2022 school year to join our highly qualified, committed and dedicated staff:
subHeadingText: Please see requirements on next page and e-mail your application to: careers@gadschool.com

attachPoints.point: A copy of valid BC Teaching Certificate

attachText: We thank all applicants for their interest in G.A.D. Elementary, but only suitable applicants will be called for an interview.

requirementsPoints.point: Ability to foster and maintain a safe positive learning environment
Strong interpersonal skills. Has the ability to communicate effectively with students, colleagues and parents
Team player – participates in team building and planning, instructional activities focused on improving instructional practices and student learning
Plan, implement, and evaluate effective classroom instruction
Ability to develop, modify, adjust and adapt curriculum to meet the individual needs of the students
Recognize individual students’ needs and provide appropriate strategies and interventions
Proficiency in use of PC’s Microsoft Office, email, and integrating technology in the classroom
Previous teaching experience is an asset. However, new graduates are also welcome
